KiBot
  • Configuration
  • Section order

Section orderÔÉÅ

The file is divided in various sections. Some of them are optional.

The order in which they are declared is not relevant, they are interpreted in the following order:

  • kiplot/kibot see The header

  • import see Importing outputs from another file, Importing other stuff from another file and Importing internal templates

  • global see Default global options

  • filters see Filters and variants

  • variants see Filters and variants

  • preflight see The preflight section

  • outputs see The outputs section

  • groups see Grouping outputs
